00215 /*
00216  * Thoses structures are used to handle FSAL attributes.
00217  */
00218 
00220 typedef enum shell_attr_type__ {  
00221   
00222   ATTR_NONE = 0, /* this special value is used
00223             to indicate the end of the attribute list */
00224       
00225   ATTR_32, /* 32 bits attribute */
00226   ATTR_64, /* 64 bits attribute */
00227   ATTR_OCTAL, /* octal number attribute */
00228   ATTR_TIME   /* YYYYMMDDhhmmss attribute */
00229       
00230 } shell_attr_type_t;
00231 
00232 
00234 typedef struct shell_attribute__ {
00235   
00236   char *                attr_name ; /* name of the attribute. */
00237   shell_attr_type_t     attr_type ; /* type of the attribute. */  
00238   fsal_attrib_mask_t    attr_mask ; /* fsal mask constant */
00239   unsigned long int     attr_offset;/* fsal field offset */
00240   
00241 } shell_attribute_t ; 
00242

00247 static shell_attribute_t  __attribute__(( __unused__ )) shell_attr_list[] = {  
00248   {"SIZE" , ATTR_64,     FSAL_ATTR_SIZE,  offsetof( fsal_attrib_list_t, filesize )},
00249   {"MODE" , ATTR_OCTAL,  FSAL_ATTR_MODE,  offsetof( fsal_attrib_list_t, mode )},
00250   {"OWNER", ATTR_32,     FSAL_ATTR_OWNER, offsetof( fsal_attrib_list_t, owner )},
00251   {"GROUP", ATTR_32,     FSAL_ATTR_GROUP, offsetof( fsal_attrib_list_t, group )},
00252   {"ATIME", ATTR_TIME,   FSAL_ATTR_ATIME, offsetof( fsal_attrib_list_t, atime )},
00253   {"CTIME", ATTR_TIME,   FSAL_ATTR_CTIME, offsetof( fsal_attrib_list_t, ctime )},
00254   {"MTIME", ATTR_TIME,   FSAL_ATTR_MTIME, offsetof( fsal_attrib_list_t, mtime )},
00255       
00256   /* end of the list */
00257   {NULL, ATTR_NONE, 0, 0}
00258   
00259 };
